1. Bipolar Referencing

$Bipolar Referenced Channel =  X_{Channel} - X_{Reference}$

2. Coherence

$Coherence_{xy} = \frac{|C_{xy}|}{P_{x}P_{y}}$

3. Probit formula

$probit(\pi) = \Phi^{-1}(\pi), \ \ 0 \leq\pi\leq1$

4. ARIMA Formula

$\hat{y_t} \text{ or } \hat{(y_t-y_{t-d})} = \mu + \displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{p}\phi_iy_{t-i}+\displaystyle\sum_{j=1}^{q}\theta_je_{t-j}+e_t$

5. Variance in OLS vs GLS

\begin{align*} 
OLS: V(y) = \sigma^2I  \\
GLS: V(y) = \sigma^2\Omega \\
\end{align*}
